About This Page

The "Edit Rating Comment" page allows Super Admins or the author of the rating comment to edit their rating comment.

It makes use of the following tags:

  • Rating:Comment_Form in Edit mode to allow users to edit their rating comment.

The global sidebar on the right makes use of the following tags:

  • Rating:Rank to display a list of top rated entries.
